程序包 com.teamone.unitask.meetings

类 MeetingService

java.lang.Object
com.teamone.unitask.meetings.MeetingService
@Service public class MeetingService extends Object
Service class for managing meeting data. It interacts with repositories to perform CRUD operations on meetings.

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    MeetingService(MeetingRepository meetingRepository, ProjectRepository projectRepository)
    Constructs a MeetingService with necessary dependencies.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • MeetingService

      @Autowired public MeetingService(MeetingRepository meetingRepository, ProjectRepository projectRepository)
      Constructs a MeetingService with necessary dependencies.
      参数:
      meetingRepository - Repository for meeting data access.
      projectRepository - Repository for project data access.

  • 方法详细资料

    • get

      public List<Meeting> get(String projectTitle)
      Retrieves a list of meetings associated with a given project.
      参数:
      projectTitle - The title of the project.
      返回:
      A list of meetings related to the specified project.

    • save

      public Meeting save(String projectTitle, String title, ZonedDateTime startTime, ZonedDateTime endTime)
      Creates and saves a new meeting for a specified project.
      参数:
      projectTitle - Title of the project to which the meeting is to be added.
      title - Title of the meeting.
      startTime - Start time of the meeting.
      endTime - End time of the meeting.
      返回:
      The newly created and saved meeting.

    • delete

      public Meeting delete(String projectTitle, Long meetingId) throws NoSuchElementException
      Deletes a specified meeting from a project.
      参数:
      projectTitle - Title of the project from which the meeting is to be deleted.
      meetingId - ID of the meeting to be deleted.
      返回:
      The deleted meeting.
      抛出:
      NoSuchElementException - if the meeting or project is not found.

    • update

      public Meeting update(String projectTitle, Meeting updatedMeeting) throws NoSuchElementException
      Updates a meeting's details.
      参数:
      projectTitle - Title of the project where the meeting is located.
      updatedMeeting - Meeting object with updated details.
      返回:
      The updated meeting.
      抛出:
      NoSuchElementException - if the meeting or project is not found.
